sign: This function returns whether a number is positive, negative or neither and returns 1, -1, 0 respectively. For example - <tt>sign(458)</tt> will return 1, <tt>sign(-5)</tt> will return -1 and <tt>sign(0)</tt> will return 0.
The number to get the sign of.
The above code will add 1, -1 or 0 onto y depending on the result of <tt>y - mouse_y</tt>.
